thread.title: GM Sees No Retreat From South Korea as It Outlines New Labor Deal

author: Mike Colias
title: GM Sees No Retreat From South Korea as It Outlines New Labor Deal

organizations.name: it outlines new labor deal general motors co.

text:
General Motors Co. has exited several markets under Chief Executive Mary Barra, including Europe and India. South Korea isn’t joining that list even though it is a tough place for the Detroit auto maker to do business.
GM on Thursday outlined a new labor deal in South Korea that is expected to reverse persistent losses while salvaging the auto maker’s presence in a market that has served as a key export hub and vehicle-engineering center. The auto maker’s labor union in Korea ratified an agreement to trim as much as $500...
